text.textblock: In accordance with the Federal Advisory Committee Act (Pub. L. 92-463, as amended), the National Science Foundation announces the following meeting:
Special Emphasis Panel in Research, Evaluation and Dissemination (1210).
February 10, 1994, 1 p.m. to 7 p.m; February 11, 1994, 8 a.m. to 6:30 p.m.; February 12, 1994, 8 a.m. to 12 noon.
Room 330, National Science Foundation, 4201 Wilson Boulevard, Arlington, VA 22230.
Dr. Nora Sabelli, Program Director, 4201 Wilson Boulevard, room 855, Arlington, VA 22230. Telephone (703) 306-1651.
To provide advice and recommendations concerning proposals submitted to NSF for financial support.
To review and evaluate proposals and provide advice and recommendations as part of the selection process for proposals submitted to the Networking Infrastructure for Education Program.

Because the proposals reviewed include information of a proprietary or confidential nature, including technical information; financial data, such as salaries; and personal information concerning individuals associated with the proposals, the meetings are closed to the public. These matters are within exemptions (4) and (6) of 5 U.S.C. 552b(c), Government in the Sunshine Act.
Difficulty in arranging appropriate meeting times.

doctitle.textblock: Special Emphasis Panel in Research, Evaluation and Dissemination; Meeting
